verses.verse: And <WG1161> he said <WG3004> <WG5707> also <WG2532> unto <WG4314> his <WG846> Talmidim <WG3101>, There was <WG2258> <WG5713> a certain <WG5100> rich <WG4145> man <WG444>, which <WG3739> had <WG2192> <WG5707> a steward <WG3623>; and <WG2532> the same <WG3778> was accused <WG1225> <WG5681> unto him <WG846> that <WG5613> he had wasted <WG1287> <WG5723> his <WG846> goods <WG5224> <WG5723>.

And <WG2532> he called <WG5455> <WG5660> him <WG846>, and said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto him <WG846>, How <WG5101> is it that I hear <WG191> <WG5719> this <WG5124> of <WG4012> thee <WG4675>? give <WG591> <WG5628> an account <WG3056> of thy <WG4675> stewardship <WG3622>; for <WG1063> thou mayest be <WG1410> <WG5695> no <WG3756> longer <WG2089> steward <WG3621> <WG5721>.

Then <WG1161> the steward <WG3623> said <WG2036> <WG5627> within <WG1722> himself <WG1438>, What <WG5101> shall I do <WG4160> <WG5661>? for <WG3754> my <WG3450> lord <WG2962> taketh away <WG851> <WG5731> from <WG575> me <WG1700> the stewardship <WG3622>: I cannot <WG3756> <WG2480> <WG5719> dig <WG4626> <WG5721>; to beg <WG1871> <WG5721> I am ashamed <WG153> <WG5727>.

I am resolved <WG1097> <WG5627> what <WG5101> to do <WG4160> <WG5692>, that <WG2443>, when <WG3752> I am put out <WG3179> <WG5686> of the stewardship <WG3622>, they may receive <WG1209> <WG5667> me <WG3165> into <WG1519> their <WG846> houses <WG3624>.

So <WG2532> he called <WG4341> <WG5666> every <WG1538> one <WG1520> of his <WG1438> lord's <WG2962> debtors <WG5533> unto him, and said <WG3004> <WG5707> unto the first <WG4413>, How much <WG4214> owest thou <WG3784> <WG5719> unto my <WG3450> lord <WG2962>?

And <WG1161> he said <WG2036> <WG5627>, An hundred <WG1540> measures <WG943> of oil <WG1637>. And <WG2532> he said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto him <WG846>, Take <WG1209> <WG5663> thy <WG4675> bill <WG1121>, and <WG2532> sit down <WG2523> <WG5660> quickly <WG5030>, and write <WG1125> <WG5657> fifty <WG4004>.

Then <WG1899> said he <WG2036> <WG5627> to another <WG2087>, And <WG1161> how much <WG4214> owest <WG3784> <WG5719> thou <WG4771>? And <WG1161> he said <WG2036> <WG5627>, An hundred <WG1540> measures <WG2884> of wheat <WG4621>. And <WG2532> he said <WG3004> <WG5719> unto him <WG846>, Take <WG1209> <WG5663> thy <WG4675> bill <WG1121>, and <WG2532> write <WG1125> <WG5657> fourscore <WG3589>.

And <WG2532> the lord <WG2962> commended <WG1867> <WG5656> the unjust <WG93> steward <WG3623>, because <WG3754> he had done <WG4160> <WG5656> wisely <WG5430>: for <WG3754> the children <WG5207> of this <WG5127> world <WG165> are <WG1526> <WG5748> in <WG1519> their <WG1438> generation <WG1074> wiser <WG5429> than <WG5228> the children <WG5207> of light <WG5457>.

And I <WG2504> say <WG3004> <WG5719> unto you <WG5213>, Make <WG4160> <WG5657> to yourselves <WG1438> friends <WG5384> of <WG1537> the mammon <WG3126> of unrighteousness <WG93>; that <WG2443>, when <WG3752> ye fail <WG1587> <WG5632>, they may receive <WG1209> <WG5667> you <WG5209> into <WG1519> everlasting <WG166> habitations <WG4633>.

He that is faithful <WG4103> in <WG1722> that which is least <WG1646> is <WG2076> <WG5748> faithful <WG4103> also <WG2532> in <WG1722> much <WG4183>: and <WG2532> he that is unjust <WG94> in <WG1722> the least <WG1646> is <WG2076> <WG5748> unjust <WG94> also <WG2532> in <WG1722> much <WG4183>.

If <WG1487> therefore <WG3767> ye have <WG1096> not <WG3756> been <WG1096> <WG5633> faithful <WG4103> in <WG1722> the unrighteous <WG94> mammon <WG3126>, who <WG5101> will commit <WG4100> to your <WG5213> trust <WG4100> <WG5692> the true <WG228> riches ?

And <WG2532> if <WG1487> ye have <WG1096> not <WG3756> been <WG1096> <WG5633> faithful <WG4103> in <WG1722> that which is another man's <WG245>, who <WG5101> shall give <WG1325> <WG5692> you <WG5213> that which is your own <WG5212>?

No <WG3762> servant <WG3610> can <WG1410> <WG5736> serve <WG1398> <WG5721> two <WG1417> masters <WG2962>: for <WG1063> either <WG2228> he will hate <WG3404> <WG5692> the one <WG1520>, and <WG2532> love <WG25> <WG5692> the other <WG2087>; or else <WG2228> he will hold <WG472> <WG5695> to the one <WG1520>, and <WG2532> despise <WG2706> <WG5692> the other <WG2087>. Ye cannot <WG3756> <WG1410> <WG5736> serve <WG1398> <WG5721> 'Elohim <WG2316> and <WG2532> mammon <WG3126>.

And <WG1161> the P'rushim <WG5330> also <WG2532>, who were <WG5225> <WG5723> covetous <WG5366>, heard <WG191> <WG5707> all <WG3956> these things <WG5023>: and <WG2532> they derided <WG1592> <WG5707> him <WG846>.

And <WG2532> he said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto them <WG846>, Ye <WG5210> are <WG2075> <WG5748> they which justify <WG1344> <WG5723> yourselves <WG1438> before <WG1799> men <WG444>; but <WG1161> 'Elohim <WG2316> knoweth <WG1097> <WG5719> your <WG5216> hearts <WG2588>: for <WG3754> that which is highly esteemed <WG5308> among <WG1722> men <WG444> is <WG2076> <WG5748> abomination <WG946> in the sight <WG1799> of 'Elohim <WG2316>.

The Torah <WG3551> and <WG2532> the prophets <WG4396> were until <WG2193> Yochanan <WG2491>: since <WG575> that time <WG5119> the kingdom <WG932> of 'Elohim <WG2316> is preached <WG2097> <WG5743>, and <WG2532> every man <WG3956> presseht <WG971> <WG5731> into <WG1519> it <WG846>.

And <WG1161> it is <WG2076> <WG5748> easier <WG2123> for heaven <WG3772> and <WG2532> earth <WG1093> to pass <WG3928> <WG5629>, than <WG2228> one <WG3391> tittle <WG2762> of the Torah <WG3551> to fail <WG4098> <WG5629>.

Whosoever <WG3956> putteth away <WG630> <WG5723> his <WG846> wife <WG1135>, and <WG2532> marrieth <WG1060> <WG5723> another <WG2087>, committeth adultery <WG3431> <WG5719>: and <WG2532> whosoever <WG3956> marrieth <WG1060> <WG5723> her that is put away <WG630> <WG5772> from <WG575> her husband <WG435> committeth adultery <WG3431> <WG5719>.

<WG1161> There was <WG2258> <WG5713> a certain <WG5100> rich <WG4145> man <WG444>, which <WG2532> was clothed <WG1737> <WG5710> in purple <WG4209> and <WG2532> fine linen <WG1040>, and fared <WG2165> <WG5746> sumptuously <WG2988> every <WG2596> day <WG2250>:

And <WG1161> there was <WG2258> <WG5713> a certain <WG5100> beggar <WG4434> named <WG3686> El'azar <WG2976>, which <WG3739> was laid <WG906> <WG5718> at <WG4314> his <WG846> gate <WG4440>, full of sores <WG1669> <WG5772>,

And <WG2532> desiring <WG1937> <WG5723> to be fed <WG5526> <WG5683> with <WG575> the crumbs <WG5589> which <WG3588> fell <WG4098> <WG5723> from <WG575> the rich man's <WG4145> table <WG5132>: moreover <WG235> <WG2532> the dogs <WG2965> came <WG2064> <WG5740> and licked <WG621> <WG5707> his <WG846> sores <WG1668>.

And <WG1161> it came to pass <WG1096> <WG5633>, that the beggar <WG4434> died <WG599> <WG5629>, and <WG2532> was carried <WG667> <WG5683> by <WG5259> the angels <WG32> into <WG1519> Avraham's <WG11> bosom <WG2859>: the rich man <WG4145> also <WG1161> <WG2532> died <WG599> <WG5627>, and <WG2532> was buried <WG2290> <WG5648>;

And <WG2532> in <WG1722> SH'ol <WG86> he lift up <WG1869> <WG5660> his <WG846> eyes <WG3788>, being <WG5225> <WG5723> in <WG1722> torments <WG931>, and seeth <WG3708> <WG5719> Avraham <WG11> afar <WG3113> off <WG575>, and <WG2532> El'azar <WG2976> in <WG1722> his <WG846> bosom <WG2859>.

And <WG2532> <WG846> he cried <WG5455> <WG5660> and said <WG2036> <WG5627>, Father <WG3962> Avraham <WG11>, have mercy <WG1653> <WG5657> on me <WG3165>, and <WG2532> send <WG3992> <WG5657> El'azar <WG2976>, that <WG2443> he may dip <WG911> <WG5661> the tip <WG206> of his <WG846> finger <WG1147> in water <WG5204>, and <WG2532> cool <WG2711> <WG5661> my <WG3450> tongue <WG1100>; for <WG3754> I am tormented <WG3600> <WG5743> in <WG1722> this <WG5026> flame <WG5395>.

But <WG1161> Avraham <WG11> said <WG2036> <WG5627>, Son <WG5043>, remember <WG3415> <WG5682> that <WG3754> thou <WG4771> in <WG1722> thy <WG4675> lifetime <WG2222> receivedst <WG618> <WG5627> thy <WG4675> good things <WG18>, and <WG2532> likewise <WG3668> El'azar <WG2976> evil things <WG2556>: but <WG1161> now <WG3568> <WG3592> he is comforted <WG3870> <WG5743>, and <WG1161> thou <WG4771> art tormented <WG3600> <WG5743>.

And <WG2532> beside <WG1909> all <WG3956> this <WG5125>, between <WG3342> us <WG2257> and <WG2532> you <WG5216> there is <WG4741> a great <WG3173> gulf <WG5490> fixed <WG4741> <WG5769>: so that <WG3704> they which would <WG2309> <WG5723> pass <WG1224> <WG5629> from hence <WG1782> to <WG4314> you <WG5209> cannot <WG3361> <WG1410> <WG5741>; neither <WG3366> can they pass <WG1276> <WG5725> to <WG4314> us <WG2248>, that would come from thence <WG1564>.

Then <WG1161> he said <WG2036> <WG5627>, I pray <WG2065> <WG5719> thee <WG4571> therefore <WG3767>, father <WG3962>, that <WG2443> thou wouldest send <WG3992> <WG5661> him <WG846> to <WG1519> my <WG3450> father's <WG3962> house <WG3624>:

For <WG1063> I have <WG2192> <WG5719> five <WG4002> brethren <WG80>; that <WG3704> he may testify <WG1263> <WG5741> unto them <WG846>, lest <WG3363> they <WG846> also <WG2532> come <WG2064> <WG5632> into <WG1519> this <WG5126> place <WG5117> of torment <WG931>.
Avraham <WG11> saith <WG3004> <WG5719> unto him <WG846>, They have <WG2192> <WG5719> Mosheh <WG3475> and <WG2532> the prophets <WG4396>; let them hear <WG191> <WG5657> them <WG846>.

And <WG1161> he said <WG2036> <WG5627>, Nay <WG3780>, father <WG3962> Avraham <WG11>: but <WG235> if <WG1437> one <WG5100> went <WG4198> <WG5680> unto <WG4314> them <WG846> from <WG575> the dead <WG3498>, they will repent <WG3340> <WG5692>.

And <WG1161> he said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto him <WG846>, If <WG1487> they hear <WG191> <WG5719> not <WG3756> Mosheh <WG3475> and <WG2532> the prophets <WG4396>, neither <WG3761> will they be persuaded <WG3982> <WG5701>, though <WG1437> one <WG5100> rose <WG450> <WG5632> from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498>.
